banner.description: GP4Tech is a community that aims to involve more women in the area of technology. Come and meet us at our next event: Weekend Coding.

donate.note1: *** Take into account the following characteristics for the reception of payments through the BANCO DO BRASIL:
donate.note2: 1. Receipt of business-to-business or business-to-person payments of the COMMERCIAL type.
donate.note3: 2. No payments and/or person-to-person transfers shall be made for any reason.
